statements: SELECT * FROM user_permissions;
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_permissions WHERE permission_level > 1;
SELECT * FROM user_permissions WHERE role_id IN (1, 2);
SELECT user_id, permission_level FROM user_permissions WHERE role_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, role_id, permission_level FROM user_permissions ORDER BY role_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_permissions WHERE permission_level > 2;
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_permissions WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT permission_level FROM user_permissions WHERE role_id = 4 ORDER BY permission_level DESC;
SELECT user_id, role_id, permission_level FROM user_permissions WHERE permission_level BETWEEN 1 AND 3 ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_permissions WHERE role_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY user_id DESC, role_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_roles;
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT role_name FROM roles WHERE role_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM user_roles WHERE role_id = 1 ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles WHERE role_id = 2 ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles WHERE role_id IN (SELECT role_id FROM roles WHERE role_name = 'admin');
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles ORDER BY role_id DESC, user_id ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_users FROM user_roles WHERE role_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles WHERE user_id < 5 ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = '1b9d6bcd-bbfd-4b2d-9b5d-ab8dfbbd4c1f';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE role = 'Admin';
SELECT user_id, role FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'Jo%';
SELECT * FROM roles WHERE role_name = 'Manager';
SELECT * FROM permissions;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE role = 'user' ORDER BY email DESC;

SELECT u.username, r.role_name, p.permission_name FROM users u JOIN roles r ON u.role = r.role_name JOIN permissions p ON r.role_id = p.role_id WHERE u.user_id = '456e7890-12d3-b456-a456-426615278000';
SELECT * FROM UserPermissions;
SELECT user_id, permission_level FROM UserPermissions WHERE permission_level > 2;
SELECT role_name FROM Roles WHERE role_id = 1 ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM UserRoles WHERE role_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT permission_level FROM BlockchainGovernance WHERE role_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM UserPermissions;
SELECT user_id, permission_level FROM UserPermissions ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT UserPermissions.user_id, Roles.role_name FROM UserPermissions JOIN UserRoles ON UserPermissions.user_id = UserRoles.user_id JOIN Roles ON UserRoles.role_id = Roles.role_id;

SELECT UserPermissions.user_id, Roles.role_name, BlockchainGovernance.permission_level FROM UserPermissions JOIN UserRoles ON UserPermissions.user_id = UserRoles.user_id JOIN Roles ON UserRoles.role_id = Roles.role_id JOIN BlockchainGovernance ON UserPermissions.permission_level = BlockchainGovernance.permission_level;
SELECT * FROM UserPermissions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_roles;
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT role_name FROM roles WHERE role_id = 2;
SELECT username, role_name FROM users JOIN roles ON users.role_id = roles.role_id;
SELECT user_id, permission_name FROM user_permissions JOIN permissions ON user_permissions.permission_id = permissions.permission_id;
SELECT * FROM users INNER JOIN roles ON users.role_id = roles.role_id
SELECT users.username, roles.role_name FROM users JOIN roles ON users.role_id = roles.role_id WHERE users.user_id = 1

SELECT users.username, roles.role_name, permissions.permission_name FROM users JOIN roles ON users.role_id = roles.role_id JOIN user_permissions ON users.user_id = user_permissions.user_id JOIN permissions ON user_permissions.permission_id = permissions.permission_id
SELECT users.username, COUNT(*) AS total_permissions FROM users JOIN user_permissions ON users.user_id = user_permissions.user_id GROUP BY users.username

SELECT permissions.permission_name, COUNT(*) AS total_users FROM permissions JOIN user_permissions ON permissions.permission_id = user_permissions.permission_id GROUP BY permissions.permission_name ORDER BY total_users DESC
